code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./NavBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavBar=()=>{const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);};const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'Home'},{path:'/matrix-operations',label:'Matrix Operations'},{path:'/eigenvalues',label:'Eigenvalues & Eigenvectors'},{path:'/svd-demo',label:'SVD Demo'},{path:'/visualizer-2d',label:'2D Visualizer'},{path:'/projects',label:'Projects'},{path:'/about',label:'About'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-brand",children:"Linear Algebra Studio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"navbar-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,"aria-label":"Toggle navigation menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-toggle-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-toggle-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-toggle-icon"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-menu ".concat(isMenuOpen?'active':''),children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,className:"navbar-link ".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),children:item.label},item.path))})]})});};export default NavBar;
